verses.verse: <WG1161> After<WG3326> these things<WG5023> the Lord<WG2962> appointed<WG322> other<WG2087> seventy<WG1440> also<WG2532>, and<WG2532> sent<WG649> them<WG846> two<WG303> and two<WG1417> before<WG4253> his<WG846> face<WG4383> into<WG1519> every<WG3956> city<WG4172> and<WG2532> place<WG5117>, whither<WG3757> <WG3739> he himself<WG846> would<WG3195> come<WG2064>.

Therefore<WG3767> said he<WG3004> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, The harvest<WG2326> truly<WG3303> is great<WG4183>, but<WG1161> the labourers<WG2040> are few<WG3641>: pray ye<WG1189> therefore<WG3767> the Lord<WG2962> of the harvest<WG2326>, that<WG3704> he would send forth<WG1544> labourers<WG2040> into<WG1519> his<WG846> harvest<WG2326>.
Go your ways<WG5217>: behold<WG2400>, I<WG1473> send<WG649> you<WG5209> forth<WG649> as<WG5613> lambs<WG704> among<WG1722> <WG3319> wolves<WG3074>.
Carry<WG941> neither<WG3361> purse<WG905>, nor<WG3361> scrip<WG4082>, nor<WG3366> shoes<WG5266>: and<WG2532> salute<WG782> no man<WG3367> by<WG2596> the way<WG3598>.
And<WG1161> into<WG1519> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG302> house<WG3614> ye enter<WG1525>, first<WG4412> say<WG3004>, Peace<WG1515> be to this<WG5129> house<WG3624>.

And<WG2532> if<WG1437> <WG3303> the son<WG5207> of peace<WG1515> be<WG5600> there<WG1563>, your<WG5216> peace<WG1515> shall rest<WG1879> upon<WG1909> it<WG846>: if not<WG1490>, it shall turn<WG344> to<WG1909> you<WG5209> again<WG344>.

And<WG1161> in<WG1722> the same<WG846> house<WG3614> remain<WG3306>, eating<WG2068> and<WG2532> drinking<WG4095> such things as<WG3844> they<WG846> give<WG3844>: for<WG1063> the labourer<WG2040> is<WG2076> worthy<WG514> of his<WG846> hire<WG3408>. Go<WG3327> not<WG3361> from<WG1537> house<WG3614> to<WG1519> house<WG3614>.

And<WG2532> into<WG1519> whatsoever<WG1161> <WG3739> <WG302> city<WG4172> ye enter<WG1525>, and<WG2532> they receive<WG1209> you<WG5209>, eat such things<WG2068> as are set before<WG3908> you<WG5213>:
And<WG2532> heal<WG2323> the sick<WG772> that are therein<WG1722> <WG846>, and<WG2532> say<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, The kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is come nigh<WG1448> unto<WG1909> you<WG5209>.

But<WG1161> into<WG1519> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG302> city<WG4172> ye enter<WG1525>, and<WG2532> they receive<WG1209> you<WG5209> not<WG3361>, go your ways out<WG1831> into<WG1519> the streets<WG4113> of the same<WG846>, and say<WG2036>,

Even<WG2532> the very dust<WG2868> of<WG1537> your<WG5216> city<WG4172>, which<WG3588> cleaveth<WG2853> on us<WG2254>, we do wipe off<WG631> against you<WG5213>: notwithstanding<WG4133> be ye sure<WG1097> of this<WG5124>, that<WG3754> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is come nigh<WG1448> unto<WG1909> you<WG5209>.
But<WG1161> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, that<WG3754> it shall be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> in<WG1722> that<WG1565> day<WG2250> for Sodom<WG4670>, than<WG2228> for that<WG1565> city<WG4172>.

Woe<WG3759> unto thee<WG4671>, Chorazin<WG5523>! woe<WG3759> unto thee<WG4671>, Bethsaida<WG966>! for<WG3754> if<WG1487> the mighty works<WG1411> had been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605>, which<WG3588> have been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>, they had<WG3340> a great while ago<WG3819> repented<WG3340>, sitting<WG2521> in<WG302> <WG1722> sackcloth<WG4526> and<WG2532> ashes<WG4700>.
But<WG4133> it shall be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> at<WG1722> the judgment<WG2920>, than<WG2228> for you<WG5213>.
And<WG2532> thou<WG4771>, Capernaum<WG2584>, which<WG3588> art exalted<WG5312> to<WG2193> heaven<WG3772>, shalt be thrust down<WG2601> to<WG2193> hell<WG86>.

He that heareth<WG191> you<WG5216> heareth<WG191> me<WG1700>; and<WG2532> he that despiseth<WG114> you<WG5209> despiseth<WG114> me<WG1691>; and<WG1161> he that despiseth<WG114> me<WG1691> despiseth<WG114> him that sent<WG649> me<WG3165>.

And<WG1161> the seventy<WG1440> returned again<WG5290> with<WG3326> joy<WG5479>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, even<WG2532> the devils<WG1140> are subject<WG5293> unto us<WG2254> through<WG1722> thy<WG4675> name<WG3686>.
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, I beheld<WG2334> Satan<WG4567> as<WG5613> lightning<WG796> fall<WG4098> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>.

Behold<WG2400>, I give<WG1325> unto you<WG5213> power<WG1849> to tread<WG3961> on<WG1883> serpents<WG3789> and<WG2532> scorpions<WG4651>, and<WG2532> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> the power<WG1411> of the enemy<WG2190>: and<WG2532> nothing<WG3762> shall<WG91> by any means<WG3364> hurt<WG91> <WG91> you<WG5209>.

Notwithstanding<WG4133> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> rejoice<WG5463> not<WG3361>, that<WG3754> the spirits<WG4151> are subject<WG5293> unto you<WG5213>; but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> rejoice<WG5463>, because<WG3754> your<WG5216> names<WG3686> are written<WG1125> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.

In<WG1722> that<WG846> hour<WG5610> Jesus<WG2424> rejoiced in<WG21> spirit<WG4151>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, I thank<WG1843> thee<WG4671>, O Father<WG3962>, Lord<WG2962> of heaven<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth<WG1093>, that<WG3754> thou hast hid<WG613> these things<WG5023> from<WG575> the wise<WG4680> and<WG2532> prudent<WG4908>, and<WG2532> hast revealed<WG601> them<WG846> unto babes<WG3516>: even so<WG3483>, Father<WG3962>; for<WG3754> so<WG3779> it seemed<WG1096> good<WG2107> in<WG1715> thy<WG4675> sight<WG1715>.

All things<WG3956> are delivered<WG3860> to me<WG3427> of<WG5259> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>: and<WG2532> no man<WG3762> knoweth<WG1097> who<WG5101> the Son<WG5207> is<WG2076>, but<WG1508> the Father<WG3962>; and<WG2532> who<WG5101> the Father<WG3962> is<WG2076>, but<WG1508> the Son<WG5207>, and<WG2532> he to whom<WG3739> <WG1437> the Son<WG5207> will<WG1014> reveal<WG601> him. many ancient copies add these words at the beginning of verse, and<WG2532> turning<WG4762> to<WG4314> his Disciples<WG3101>, he said<WG2036>

And<WG2532> he turned him<WG4762> unto<WG4314> his disciples<WG3101>, and said<WG2036> privately<WG2398> <WG2596>, Blessed<WG3107> are the eyes<WG3788> which<WG3588> see<WG991> the things that<WG3739> ye see<WG991>:

For<WG1063> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213>, that<WG3754> many<WG4183> prophets<WG4396> and<WG2532> kings<WG935> have desired<WG2309> to see<WG1492> those things which<WG3739> ye<WG5210> see<WG991>, and<WG2532> have<WG1492> not<WG3756> seen<WG1492> them; and<WG2532> to hear<WG191> those things which<WG3739> ye hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> have<WG191> not<WG3756> heard<WG191> them.

And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, a certain<WG5100> lawyer<WG3544> stood up<WG450>, and<WG2532> tempted<WG1598> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Master<WG1320>, what<WG5101> shall I do<WG4160> to inherit<WG2816> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>?
<WG1161> He said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>, What<WG5101> is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551>? how<WG4459> readest thou<WG314>?

And<WG1161> he answering<WG611> said<WG2036>, Thou shalt love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG2316> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> heart<WG2588>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> soul<WG5590>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> strength<WG2479>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> mind<WG1271>; and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> neighbour<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself<WG4572>.
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Thou hast answered<WG611> right<WG3723>: this<WG5124> do<WG4160>, and<WG2532> thou shalt live<WG2198>.
But<WG1161> he, willing<WG2309> to justify<WG1344> himself<WG1438>, said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> Jesus<WG2424>, And<WG2532> who<WG5101> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> neighbour<WG4139>?

And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG5274> said<WG2036>, A certain<WG5100> man <WG444> went down<WG2597> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2419> to<WG1519> Jericho<WG2410>, and<WG2532> fell among<WG4045> thieves<WG3027>, which<WG3739> <WG2532> stripped<WG1562> him<WG846> of his raiment<WG1562>, and<WG2532> wounded<WG4127> <WG2007> him, and departed<WG565>, leaving<WG863> him half dead<WG2253> <WG5177>.

And<WG1161> by<WG2596> chance<WG4795> there came down<WG2597> a certain<WG5100> priest<WG2409> that<WG1722> <WG1565> way<WG3598>: and<WG2532> when he saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, he passed by on the other side<WG492>.
And<WG1161> likewise<WG3668> <WG2532> a Levite<WG3019>, when he was<WG1096> at<WG2596> the place<WG5117>, came<WG2064> and<WG2532> looked<WG1492> on him, and passed by on the other side<WG492>.
But<WG1161> a certain<WG5100> Samaritan<WG4541>, as he journeyed<WG3593>, came<WG2064> where<WG2596> he was<WG846>: and<WG2532> when he saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, he had compassion<WG4697> on him,

And<WG2532> went<WG4334> to him, and bound up<WG2611> his<WG846> wounds<WG5134>, pouring in<WG2022> oil<WG1637> and<WG2532> wine<WG3631>, and<WG1161> set<WG1913> him<WG846> on<WG1909> his own<WG2398> beast<WG2934>, and brought<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG1519> an inn<WG3829>, and<WG2532> took care<WG1959> of him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> on<WG1909> the morrow<WG839> when he departed<WG1831>, he took out<WG1544> two<WG1417> pence<WG1220>, and gave<WG1325> them to the host<WG3830>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Take care<WG1959> of him<WG846>; and<WG2532> whatsoever<WG3748> <WG302> thou spendest more<WG4325>, when I<WG3165> come again<WG1722> <WG1880>, I<WG1473> will repay<WG591> thee<WG4671>.
Which<WG5101> now<WG3767> of these<WG5130> three<WG5140>, thinkest<WG1380> thou<WG4671>, was<WG1096> neighbour<WG4139> unto him that fell<WG1706> among<WG1519> the thieves<WG3027>?

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, He that shewed<WG4160> mercy<WG1656> on<WG3326> him<WG846>. Then<WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> unto him<WG846>, Go<WG4198>, and<WG2532> do<WG4160> thou<WG4771> likewise<WG3668>.

Now<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, as<WG1722> they<WG846> went<WG4198>, that<WG2532> he<WG846> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> a certain<WG5100> village<WG2968>: and<WG1161> a certain<WG5100> woman<WG1135> named<WG3686> Martha<WG3136> received<WG5264> him<WG846> into<WG1519> her<WG846> house<WG3624>.

And<WG2532> she<WG3592> had<WG2258> a sister<WG79> called<WG2564> Mary<WG3137>, which<WG3739> also<WG2532> sat<WG3869> at<WG3844> Jesus'<WG2424> feet<WG4228>, and heard<WG191> his<WG846> word<WG3056>.

But<WG1161> Martha<WG3136> was cumbered<WG4049> about<WG4012> much<WG4183> serving<WG1248>, and<WG1161> came to him<WG2186>, and said<WG2036>, Lord<WG2962>, dost<WG3199> thou<WG4671> not<WG3756> care<WG3199> that<WG3754> my<WG3450> sister<WG79> hath left<WG2641> me<WG3165> to serve<WG1247> alone<WG3441>? bid<WG2036> her<WG846> therefore<WG3767> that<WG2443> she help<WG4878> me<WG3427>.
And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto her<WG846>, Martha<WG3136>, Martha<WG3136>, thou art careful<WG3309> and<WG2532> troubled<WG5182> about<WG4012> many things<WG4183>:

But<WG1161> one thing<WG1520> is<WG2076> needful<WG5532>: and<WG1161> Mary<WG3137> hath chosen<WG1586> that good<WG18> part<WG3310>, which<WG3748> shall<WG851> not<WG3756> be taken away<WG851> from<WG575> her<WG846>.
